Columns.Description: Type of agent the data was collected from. Possible values are OpsManager (Windows agent) or Linux.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of Operations Manager management group.
Columns.Name: ManagementGroupName

Columns.Description: IP address of the computer. Note that public IP is used
Columns.Name: ComputerIP

Columns.Description: Computer name
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Value is Direct Agent SCOM Agent or SCOM Management Server.
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: Type of OS. Possible values are Windows or Linux .
Columns.Name: OSType

Columns.Description: Name of OS.
Columns.Name: OSName

Columns.Description: Operating system major version.
Columns.Name: OSMajorVersion

Columns.Description: Operating system minor version.
Columns.Name: OSMinorVersion

Columns.Description: Version of the agent.
Columns.Name: Version

Columns.Description: Specfies how agent is connected to workspace. Possible values are Direct or SCManagementServer.
Columns.Name: SCAgentChannel

Columns.Description: If Log Analytics gateway is installed value is true otherwise value is false.
Columns.Name: IsGatewayInstalled

Columns.Description: Longitude of computer's geographic location.
Columns.Name: RemoteIPLongitude

Columns.Description: Latitude of computer's geographic location.
Columns.Name: RemoteIPLatitude

Columns.Description: Geographic location where computer is deployed.
Columns.Name: RemoteIPCountry

Columns.Description: Subscription ID of the Azure resource running the agent
Columns.Name: SubscriptionId

Columns.Description: Resource name of the Azure resource running the agent.
Columns.Name: ResourceGroup

Columns.Description: Resource provider of the Azure resource running the agent
Columns.Name: ResourceProvider

Columns.Description: Resource group name of the Azure resource running the agent.
Columns.Name: Resource

Columns.Description: Resource ID of the Azure resource running the agent. Retained for for backward compatibility. _ResourceId should be used.
Columns.Name: ResourceId

Columns.Description: Type of the Azure resource running the agent. Examples include virtualmachines or managedclusters.
Columns.Name: ResourceType

Columns.Description: Environment that hosts the computer: Azure or Non-Azure
Columns.Name: ComputerEnvironment

Columns.Description: List of solutions deployed on the agent at the moment when Heartbeat was issued.
Columns.Name: Solutions

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
